rss.channel:
广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐图表，新闻，照片和视频星期五，2025年1月31日22:18:06 +0000 En-us小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.5.5 200641670 泰勒（Tyler），创作者在游行乐队中跳跃，并戴上“粘性”视频预告片的拳击手套：观看https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/tyler-theer-cereator-sticky-video-trailer-1235889265/Michael Saponara Fri, 31 Jan 2025 22:18:02 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-HopMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889265 Tyler's self-directed visual is on the way.

没有人会混淆奥林匹克运动员的创造者泰勒（Tyler ），但他将即将到来的“粘性”视觉介绍在体育界。

泰勒（Tyler）在星期五（1月31日）为自我指导的Chromakopia视频提供了预告片，该视频从足球队在烤架上的huddle跳到格莱美奖得主，在一支游行乐队中演奏铜管乐器乐器，泰勒（Tyler拳击手套，例如迈克·泰森（Mike Tyson）。

有关的

泰勒（Tyler），是“ Chromakopia”上“最诚实的版本”的创作者

12/11/2024

黑白剪辑仍然没有牢固的发布日期，但粉丝们可以期望它很快到达。 “视频将会到来，”他为YouTube视频的描述加上了标题。

“粘性”的特点是Sexy Red，Glorilla和Lil Wayne的助攻，以及Bumping Chromakopia Posse Cut Cut Cut cright Billboard Hot 100的前10名。泰勒（Tyler），创作者的第八张录音室专辑在Billboard 200中获得了2000年的专辑，总计不到300,000张专辑。

借助泰勒和肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar）之间的游行乐队预告片和加利福尼亚之间的联系，一些球迷们推测泰勒可以在下个月在新奥尔良的K. Dot的超级碗Lix Lix Halftime Show露面。

不幸的是，泰勒（Tyler）在参加Chromakopia巡回演出的道路上关闭了超级碗粉丝驱动的理论。但是，泰勒将在堪萨斯城和丹佛的表演之间，超级碗周日（2月9日）有一个暂停的日子。

“ n - 我在巡回赛上，我不会参加足球比赛，最好看肯尼，”他跳入IG评论部分，关闭谣言磨坊。

观看下面的“粘性”预告片。

; 1235889265 Coupe谈到Latto的格莱美奖提名“大妈妈”：“作为制片人，我们的工作是为艺术家服务” https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/2025-first-time-grammy-nominee-coupe-latto-big-mama-1235888775/Kyle-Brandon Denis Fri, 31 Jan 2025 22:11:14 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-Hop2025 GrammysGrammysmusic https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235888775 The ATL producer is a first-time Grammy nominee for his work on Latto's "Big Mama." Read his reflections on his journey.

经过多年与南方最嗡嗡的说唱歌手和制作Billboard Hot 100命中的联系，例如“ Peaches＆Eggpleants”（第33号）（与长期合作者Young Nudy ）ATL-BRED-BRED制作人Coupe为他的收藏增添了非常特别的荣誉：他的收藏：他的收藏：他的收藏：最初是格莱美奖提名的生产。

有关的

大妈妈的房子：拉托保证她的专辑将把她弹入嘻哈精英

07/19/2024

在第67届年度格莱美奖颁奖典礼上 - 将于2月2日在洛杉矶的Crypto.com竞技场举行，并为受到毁灭性的一月份大火影响的人提供筹款活动 - 拉托的“大妈妈”与Oz和Masterpiece一起制作，获得了最佳旋律说唱表演的提名。如果Billboard的2024年第5位最热门的女性说唱歌手将奖杯带回家，Coupe将获得冠军证书。

一半的说唱民谣和一半的高辛烷值陷阱爆炸，“大妈妈”是拉托的糖蜂蜜冰冰茶专辑中的第三张单曲。该曲目在热R＆B/嘻哈歌曲上的热R＆B/Hip-Hop歌曲上达到了92号，第23号。 “ Big Mama”在WHTA（Hot 107.9）生日狂欢和2024 BET大奖的著名表演中，“ Big Mama”帮助其父母专辑在Billboard 200上的15号和说唱专辑的第一名，使Latto成为Latto成为第一个来自ATL始终排名最高。除了“大妈妈”外，双门轿跑车还从糖蜂蜜冰茶中生产了“ Brake”和“ S/O”。

“大妈妈”将不得不击倒“意大利面条”（ 碧昂斯，Shaboozey ＆ Linda Martell ），“ 3：AM”（ Rapsody ＆ Erykah Badu ），“ Kehlani”（ Jordan Adetunji ＆ Kehlani ）和“我们仍然不信任您”（ Future ， Metro Boomin ＆ The Weeknd ）将获得奖杯，但唱片学院仍然是嘻哈最令人兴奋的制片人之一的令人难以置信的邮票。

在2024年与拉托（Latto）的合作之外，Coupe还为21名Savage （ American Dream ）和Glorilla （光荣）的专辑贡献了曲目。对于前者，他制作了夏季沃克协助的“证明它”，该助理在有节奏的Airplay上度过了两个星期。

在音乐最大的夜晚前几天，Coupe在为Real Boston Richey创作“底特律R＆B Love Record”的工作中短暂停下来，与Billboard交谈，并反思他的第一首格莱美提名歌曲。

他承诺：“我可能会想念格莱美奖[因为]我有一些家庭活动，但我一定会很快来。” “这对我来说意义重大，因为[音乐是我父亲想做的事情。他通过我实现自己的梦想。 [“大妈妈”占领格莱美家的家将是下一个水平。”

告诉我有关您第一次与Latto在工作室中的联系。

我们已经试图聚在一起一段时间，但是我们的日程安排并不一致。但是我们终于在Doppler Studios聚集在一起，我在第一届会议上为她扮演了21个Savage的“证明它”的节拍。实际上，她以“证明它”的方式录制了一些击败的东西。我们也制作了其他几个记录。氛围很棒，我们互相告诉我们彼此的粉丝。我们只是立即点击。

“大妈妈”是怎么在一起的？

制作曲目的第一个版本时，它仍然是两部分的拍击。她从绿野仙踪中获得了第一部分，然后第二部分来自另一个生产商。她只录制了这首歌的前半部分，并且根据自己和[制片人]灰熊所做的事情有一个想法。她打电话给我，说：“我喜欢第一部分，但我并不是在第二次跳动。”她和小熊维茨（Pooh Beatz）帮助我完成了唱片的帮助，就像：“兄弟，第二部分我们需要一些轿跑车的东西！我们需要一些东西才能将其切换。”

他们需要那天的节拍。我们在晚上8点举行了一次会议，他们在下午6点打电话给我，我在5-10分钟内进行了节拍。我很早就去了录音室​​，这就是我们全力以赴的歌曲。奥兹（Oz）和小子杰作（Kid Masterpiece）做了第一部分，我做了第二部分。我们将它们放在一起，它们完美匹配，然后我们完成了歌曲。

当您听到最后的曲目时，您的脑海中发生了什么？

我们就像，“这是肯定的。”她已经制作专辑已有两年了，我进入了[该过程]一年。她就像，“我需要一些点燃的氛围；让我知道我缺少什么。” [“大妈妈”]具有柔和的语气，但也有一种转盘。我觉得这就是整个[糖蜂蜜冰茶]专辑中缺少的东西。

而且我也没有听到很多女孩也打开开关。嘻哈音乐中的男性真的很喜欢这样做，所以让一位女性说唱歌手在一首歌上说出两种不同的风格对我来说是开创性的。

您是什么时候第一次看到她现场直播歌曲？

我第一次看到她表演歌曲现场直播是在[whta（Hot 107.9）]生日狂欢中 - 那是在正式发行之前。现在在嘻哈音乐中，这是一件大事，让事情泄漏或逗弄它们。她还在BET奖中进行了表演，并获得了很多积极的评论。这些反应让我知道音乐正在连接。

当您发现提名时，您在哪里？

我实际上和家人在家里。我不会撒谎，这让我感到惊讶。我不知道该怎么办！这是我的第一首[格莱美奖提名]歌曲，这是一件大事，所以我向我的孩子们展示了，例如：“您的爸爸的[歌曲被提名为格莱美！”他们甚至不知道这是什么，因为他们这么年轻。 [笑。这是给出的

格莱美奖对我来说意味着一切。就像赢得冠军戒指一样。您从[童年时代]创作音乐的一生，并建立自己的最高荣誉就是格莱美奖。没有什么比它更大的了。当您赢得冠军时，就像赢得冠军一样。甚至被提名就像进入季后赛或决赛一样。我们必须赢得这些决赛！

您的父亲对您的音乐旅程有多大影响？

我一生都在做音乐。我从5-6岁的教堂里打鼓，直到我大约10岁或11岁，然后开始弹钢琴和风琴。我父亲教我所有这一切。从小就开始玩。我一出生就将我扔到乐器上，就像“你需要玩。”而且我从出生开始就一直这样做。我曾经也在合唱团唱歌。至于生产，我从2014 - 15年开始这样做。但是我父亲对此至关重要。他喜欢70年代和地球，风与火和里克·詹姆斯（Rick James）。这就是为什么70年代是我现在最喜欢的音乐类型的原因。

您一直想品尝的一首70年代歌曲是什么？

地球，风与火的“理由”。

您还去年还制作了21 Savage和Glorilla的专辑。在维持艺术完整性的同时，您如何适应不同艺术家的声音？

作为制作人，我们的工作是为艺术家服务。我只是试图在实施我的声音时忠于艺术家的声音。每位艺术家都有一个想要进入项目的方向，因此我试图填补他们缺少的空白。但是我仍然保持正直；我有奇怪的鼓图案，我的hat帽大声，踢脚击中！

例如，格洛利拉（Glorilla）来自孟菲斯。三个黑手党喜欢以撒海斯，所以这就是为什么我在“让她做饭”上抽样“艾克的心情”。那是传统的孟菲斯声音。 21 Savage喜欢R＆B，所以我想品尝Faith Evans的“您是我的喜悦”，这是我有史以来最好的R＆B插曲之一。我使用他们给我的任何工具，然后用我的声音阐述它们。

第一次在收音机上听到“证明它”是什么感觉？

伙计，我喜欢它。这很有趣，因为当时我和一个女孩在车上。当它出现时，她就像，“这不是你的歌吗？” [笑。 ]对我来说绝对是一个时刻。 “证明它”就是一首歌，一旦他们将其发送给我，我就想：“这绝对是广播唱片。”一旦我们遇到了夏季沃克，那就去了。

谁留在您的合作者列表中？

绝对是Sza。她在名单的顶部；我喜欢她的声音，她的声音以及她的音乐方式使我想起了我对Faith Evans的感觉。当然，山羊肯德里克[Lamar]和Drake。 André3000绝对也在该列表中。我很想和他一起做一个唱片。 “聚会的生活”对我来说是一个经典的唱片，我知道他甚至没有尝试。他只需要玩得开心，让它流动。在老一辈中：他肯定是PAT计划。

您在2025年做了什么？

我和[Young] Nudy即将锁定；在过去的两年中，我们花了一点休假来处理其他事情。可能是我和他之间的一个项目，所以我为此感到兴奋。

我和JT锁定了两三天，我不会撒谎，我们做了一些疯狂的唱片。她和拉托，在女性方面，我爱他们。他们是如此有才华。

您认为谁会赢得最佳说唱专辑？您认为谁应该赢？

这是一个很难的问题，因为通常每当Eminem属于“最佳说唱”类别时，他都会获胜。但是我绝对认为地铁和未来应该赢，因为他们去年改变了文化。我一直在为此。肯德里克（Kendrick）的“像那样”经文改变了整个文化，而且专辑本身是如此出色 - 尤其是他们很长时间没有一起工作。

说到肯德里克（Kendrick），您认为他可以为“不喜欢我们？”中的年度唱片或年度歌曲（或两者兼而有之）的胜利（或两者！）

一定。肯德里克（Kendrick）是一位开创性的艺术家。他肯定会赢得这两个 - 很有可能。

; 1235888775 星期五舞蹈音乐指南：杰米XX和Erykah Badu，Anotr＆More的本周最佳新曲目https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/best-new-dance-songs-deadmau5-kaskade-jamei-xx-xx-1235889145/Katie Bain Fri, 31 Jan 2025 22:01:28 +0000 MusicMusic NewsDance https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889145 Simply the best new dance tracks of the week.

本周舞蹈音乐：Crazy P的吉姆·巴伦（Jim Barron）和克里斯·托德（Chris Todd） 在乐队的新专辑中反映了新的专辑，以及最近失去其主任丹妮尔·摩尔（Danielle Moore），这是一首来自沼泽的新曲目，乔纳斯兄弟（Jonas Brothers Charli XCX的Summit，Solomun和更多人被宣布为来自Sphere的任何Ma的最后四场演出的揭幕战， 她说，在她的排行榜招待小子之前，她“甚至不在Grammys'Radar上”，Shygirl 是我们的LGBTQ+艺术家之一。在2025年，休假两年后，Dirtybird Campout 宣布它与Norcal的北夜音乐节合作返回。

除了，我们所需要的只是音乐。甜美的音乐。这些是本周最好的新舞曲。

杰米XX壮举。埃里卡·巴杜（Erykah Badu），“ fu”

在吉尔·斯科特·赫伦（Gil-Scott Heron），罗宾（Robyn）和广播电台（Radiohead）的录音中，与善意的传奇人物合作，对于詹姆斯·史密斯（James Smith）（又名Jamie XX）并不罕见。史密斯在Instagram Post的《 Instagram Post》中说，在“ Fu”上，英国制片人与Neo-Soul的第一夫人Erykah Badu合作，使用了2019年“巴塞罗那的Primavera Afterparty”的“完全即兴”的自由式声乐录音。 。我们偏离了巴杜传统的情感，表现力的人声，我们听到她的押韵和吼叫着宽松的酸性屋子，并带有张力设计的张力。 “ Fu”的音乐视频与1月29日的Waves（Deluxe Edition）发行的音乐视频相符，并在其上列出了单曲。史密斯补充说：“我很高兴她是海浪的一部分。” “谢谢你，埃里卡！”

Gryffin X Kaskade壮举。 Nu-la，“在我的脑海”

尊敬的Kaskade合作伙伴与加利福尼亚的Gryffin和Nu-Comer歌手Nu La发行了他的合作者和伊利尼·约翰·萨米特（Illini John Summit）的时尚声音，为另一个令人振奋的旋律技术民谣。努拉（Nu La）的声音增强了“我脑海中”的戏剧性，情感上的积累，在我们被打击踢，一个人打中之前，它唱着“当你走了 /你仍然活在我的脑海中”。咆哮的低音和刺穿合成器铅。 “在我的脑海中”在10k项目上发布，遵循了少数奇特的tiktoks和diktoks和IG的IG，从录音室里的Gryffin和Kaskade发行了IG，让歌迷知道，尽管“我的脑海中”的强度仍然很大，但二重奏似乎仍然是一起爆炸。

鲜奶油，货车

这位加拿大制片人发布了她的新Ep Careline ，这是一首六首歌曲，其中包括三个先前发行的单曲（包括Memba Cromplocy“ Redline”），并且完全展示了艺术家出生的Caroline Cecil的黑暗，时尚的演变。杰出人物包括“ Love the Night Ahigh”，这是一种充满风的人声和疾驰的硬技术蓬勃发展的精美而闪烁的高峰时间。 “一年半前，我意识到自己坐在整个房屋和技术轨道上，” HE Pr​​oject的制片人写道。 “我有这个愿景 - Careline，一个秘密的方面项目，一个新的别名。但是，当我包裹第一位主人时，它打了我……Careline与鲜奶油并不分开。 - 这将是鲜奶油的下一章。而且我从来没有更确定任何事情。”该项目已在繁荣记录上发布。

Anotr，旅行

“我们在茫茫荒野中租了一所房子，充满了大自然，并邀请朋友，家人和音乐家联系。我们去散步，做晚餐，然后说话很多。当我们感觉到时，工作室总是在那里，音乐来自一个欲望，不需要的地方。正如标题暗示的那样，创造性的悬挂也“被psilocybin蘑菇助长了”，您会听到整个项目中这种感知的深度和亮度，尤其是其非洲融合的曲目“ Falling”，就像飞行一样，就像飞行一样有来自Kabusa东方合唱团的人声。

rebūke＆deadmau5壮举。埃德·格雷夫斯（Ed Graves），“无尽”

Rebūke＆Deadmau5的“无尽”（也带有Ed Graves）的音乐视频令人惊叹。 “ Cyber​​punk 2077”电子游戏美学无可挑剔地补充了这首歌对90年代的Trance和Techno的敬意，其滚动的低音和封闭的合成器 - 自然而然地，视频的主角最终在夜总会中，“越来越多的越来越夜总会出现”。 ERA标签。在雷贝克（Rebūke）2018年对“ Mau5”的“不完全”的混音之后，这对夫妇的新曲目“无尽”标志着他们的第一个真正的合作，雷贝克（Rebūke）称赞他的合作者是“不断的灵感来源”。 “无尽”的原始命运是一种乐器发行，直到与词曲作者梅利莎·德·克莱恩（Melissa de Kleine）和格雷夫斯（Graves）进行最后一刻的对话，导致了12小时内在曲目上进行声乐录音。 Rebuke说，该会议是“使曲目栩栩如生的”。

; 1235889145 Shaboozey仍然是TouchTunes的第一名，而Ella Langley＆Riley Green Score首次亮相https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/shaboozey-remains-touchtunes-number-number-1-langley-rangley-riley-green-green-top-dop-debut-123589188/Kevin Rutherford Fri, 31 Jan 2025 21:41:50 +0000 Chart BeatMusicbbnewsCountryMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889188 “A Bar Song (Tipsy)” has been No. 1 every time since the quarterly TouchTunes charts were launched.

就职典礼， 2024年最大的歌曲，现在是本年度的最后一首歌： Shaboozey的“ A Bar Song（Tipsy）”在2024年第四季度占据了TouchTunes Frontline排行榜的首位。

从10月1日至2024年12月31日，TouchTunes的前线和目录排行榜曲目曲目在TouchTunes Jukeboxes上播放最多的音乐，前线排名包括过去18个月发行的音乐，随后是目录Tally供18个多月前发行的任何音乐。 TouchTunes在全球超过60,000个地点设有自动点唱机。 TouchTunes数据未纳入其他广告牌图。

自从TouchTunes Frontline和Catalog Charts的存在（从2024年第二季度开始）以来，“ A Bar Song”在前线排名中排名第一，以及整个可播放目录中TouchTunes上的顶级歌曲。

它的统治恰逢这首歌的地位，是2024年TouchTunes自动点唱机上表现出色的曲调，这是自克里斯·斯塔普尔顿（Chris Stapleton ）的“田纳西威士忌”以来的第一首歌，是该平台一年中播放最多的歌曲（18个月）（18个月（18个月）当时释放的旧或更少。

“一首酒吧的歌”在2024年7月至11月之间的Billboard Hot 100上也参加了19周的比赛，将Lil Nas X的“ Old Town Road”绑在了Billy Ray Cyrus ，这是图表历史上最长的规则。它出现在2月1日的最新调查中排名第四。

上述的“田纳西威士忌”保留在TouchTunes目录图表上，这也是平台上第二大的歌曲。就像“田纳西威士忌”（Tennessee Whiskey）一样，自从启动两个排名以来，“田纳西威士忌”（Tennessee Whiskey）都在其各自的图表上统治。

但是，它确实在泰迪游泳的“失去控制”中有一些挑战者，在以前是前线的一部分之后，它毕业于目录列表。在第三季度前线统计上排名第三后，它进入了第2号目录。

托比·基思（Toby Keith ）的“我爱这个酒吧”，加思·布鲁克斯（Garth Brooks ）的“低处的朋友”和布鲁克斯和邓恩（Brooks＆Dunn）的“霓虹灯月亮”（Neon Moon）的前五名，给予“失去控制”，这是该排名第一个非国家的区别歌曲。

也就是说，前线排行榜的前五名是全国， Post Malone的“我有帮助”，其中摩根·沃伦（Morgan Wallen）担任第二名，其次是埃拉·兰利（Ella Langley ）的“你看起来像你爱我”（沃伦（Wallen）的“女牛仔”（ Ernest ）和扎克·托普（Zach Top）的“我从不撒谎”，其中包括莱利·格林（Riley Green） ）。

其中，兰利（Langley）和Top是首次亮相，标志着本季度的最高新作品。同时，“女牛仔”达到了一个新的山峰，以5-4提升。

肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar ）的“不喜欢我们”代表了前线上排名最高的非国家歌曲，将三个位置丢给了第七名。

随着假期季节落在第四季度，目录图表还看到了玛丽亚·凯里（Mariah Carey）的“我想要的圣诞节就是你”的季节性经典赛，该季节是第19位。

再说一次，沃伦（Wallen）在两位排名中都拥有最多的出场，六首歌曲（作为主角或特色）在一线排名中，而在《目录》上有一首。果冻卷总共有四个（每个两个）。

; 1235889188 Spotify带领音乐业务记录了增长。那么，为什么艺术家和词曲作者如此生气？ https://www.billboard.com/pro/spotify-led-music-business-growth-why-why-artists-angry/Glenn Peoples Fri, 31 Jan 2025 21:30:53 +0000 BusinessStreamingspotifyThe Ledger https://www.billboard.com/?post_type = billboard_pro_post&p=1235889226 Despite huge gains in industry revenues, individual creators feel they’re being cheated by streaming — a paradox that's proving difficult to solve.

一月甚至还没有结束，2025年已经感觉像是对Spotify的敌意的高峰一年，这就是说，鉴于该公司自2008年出现以来该公司吸引的批评是作为盗版狂欢音乐行业的潜在救星所吸引的。即使音乐和商业一直是必要婚姻中的伙伴，但这种关系从未有过酸味。

称其为“ Spotify悖论”。由Spotify领导的流媒体使音乐业务成为25年来最大的音乐业务，允许未签名的艺术家吸引世界各地的粉丝，恢复了当地语言音乐的受欢迎程度，并使艺术家能够在十年之前以不可想象的方式出售其目录 -然而，不满从来没有更大。行业收入飙升，但是许多艺术家和词曲作者都在挣扎和愤怒。

有关的

杜蒂报告发现，独立艺术家在2024年赚了3.41美元。

01/29/2025

不满一部分可以通过简单的数学来解释。越来越多的艺术家追逐有限的听众的注意力。根据F-1的文件，Spotify在2017年底有3500万首歌曲的目录。在2023年底（最新的计数），Spotify拥有超过1亿首曲目和500万个播客。在短短六年内，目录增加了几乎三倍。尽管其订阅者在那段时间内从7100万人增长了3倍以上，但Spotify在保持听众参与的成功是如此，以至于每流版皇室（与经济健康和公平的指标人相关的指标）低于它的同龄人。 （根据目录投资者Duetti的报告，请参见Liz Dilts Marshall最近的文章，该文章将流媒体 特许权使用费对流媒体服务进行排名。根据IFPI的说法，2017年。

但是，随着行业收入的持续增长，个人艺术家（由于进入障碍不再存在）的个人艺术家的数字正在迅速增长 - 并不觉得他们会得到赏金的相当一部分。不满是如此引人注目，因为在某种程度上，有更多的艺术家要抱怨。三十年前，它需要一份记录合同才能进入商业音乐界。今天，任何人都可以做到。 Luminate在2024年平均每天上传到DSP的平均99,000条新曲目。每年大约有3600万个新曲目争夺听众的注意。根据该公司的最新大声报道，仅在Spotify上，有500万艺术家的目录至少有100首曲目。

当然，如果Spotify鼓励人们少听，从而减少了从固定的金钱库中支付的歌曲数量并增加平均每流版税，则可以提高每流支出。随着音乐流的较少，平均支出的速度将远远超出其目前的每流0.3美分。但这会适得其反。在流媒体界，增长来自使人们参与其中，并最终将他们变成付费订阅者。拒绝听众，他们可能最终会进入社交媒体平台，那里的支出甚至更加畅销，或者是广播广播电台，该平台向艺术家支付并录制标签一无所有。

许多人看到购买的特许权使用费比流媒体版本还要公平，但是聆听和购买习惯改变了钱的流动方式。随着越来越多的人经常流媒体，艺术家和词曲作者从旧格式获得的钱更少。根据爱迪生研究（Edison Research）的数据，在2017年第四季度，AM/FM广播电台占美国人在流媒体时花费的时间的48％ （包括YouTube和Podcasts）的份额为26.5％。到2023年第四季度，AM/FM仅指挥了36％的份额，而流媒体（包括播客）占45％。 （包括流式传输和下载的有声读物，该数字上升至48％。 ％在2023年。此外，在流媒体经济中，新艺术家正在竞争旧歌曲的特许权使用费。根据Luminate的数据，在2024年的美国，《目录音乐》（定义为18个月大）占专辑总量消费量的73.3％。

有关的

Spotify明年与Premium，Duo，Family…

05/09/2024

然而，对Spotify的许多不满并不那么奇怪，更人性化。该公司的行动已被广泛认为与声称支持的艺术家相反。一个转折点是12月，哈珀（Harper）从利兹·佩利（Liz Pelly）的情绪机器上摘录了一本摘录，这本书揭示了Spotify如何从无名音乐家那里购买音乐来注入一些播放列表，例如“寒意”（Chill），例如“寒意” “必要的 - 具有省钱的专业音乐家的替代品，这些专业音乐家将为每个流提供特许权使用费。多年来，音乐界已经报道了这种据称使用“假”音乐家的使用，但佩利的书部分是由于其深刻的报道和以前未知的细节，引起了音乐界主题很少引起的主流关注，而这不涉及泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift） 。

哈珀的文章和佩利随后的书籍之旅催生了大量的评论和反应文章，内容涉及Spotify如何贬低音乐，伤害艺术家，为用户带来糟糕的聆听体验，并且是算法驱动的歌曲搜索者，该歌曲搜索者只为用户提供了一种幻想选择。但是，与多年来上传到YouTube的无数视频相比，老式媒体上Spotify报道的攻击并没有。输入诸如“ Spotify伤害艺术家”或“ Spotify特许权使用费”之类的搜索短语，您可以通过Spotify的Royalty Payouts的变化（Spotify不再在2024年向溪流付费？ （“ Spotify不付钱给艺术家……。这就是原因”）。

Spotify的计划是将其特许权使用费降低给歌曲作者和出版商的计划。去年3月，Spotify通过争夺其高级订阅Tier的音乐和原告，使歌曲创作社区采用了较低的机械特许权使用费率，这使得有资格获得降低的特许权使用费率，从而降低了授予一系列数字服务的特许权使用费率。毫不奇怪的是，包括众多格莱美词作者的出版社区表示，他们不会参加Spotify的年度格莱美派对词曲作者，该派对最终在洛杉矶大火之后被取消。本周早些时候，美国法院同意Spotify的同意，称联邦特许权使用费规则“明确”，并拒绝机械许可集体的诉讼，认为Spotify实际上没有提供一系列服务。

编写任何流媒体服务的最大检查都不会使Spotify摆脱这种悖论。本周，Spotify宣布在2024年向音乐行业支付了100亿美元，比十年前增长了十倍。 That figure implies Spotify generated nearly 20% of the global music copyright, assuming 2024 saw an 8% increase from Will Page ’s latest estimate of $45.5 billion in 2023. As Spotify's payments to the music industry increased tenfold over the last decade, streaming's growth helped compensate for declines in CD and download sales, and global recorded music revenues more than doubled from 2014 to 2024. But, again, aggregate industry gains don't capture the experiences of individual artists who feel cheated by streaming economics.

有关的

Amy Allen, Jessi Alexander, Edgar Barrera and Jessie Jo Dillon Won't Attend Spotify's Songwriter of…

01/09/2025

Help could be on the way — someday. If it's higher per-stream royalties artists want, then changing how royalties are calculated could make a difference. Currently, a streaming service pays royalties by divvying up all users' subscription and advertising revenue amongst all the tracks streamed during a given month. Whether or not you listened to Taylor Swift, your subscription fees go into the same pile of money funded by Swift's fans. An alternative method that has gained some traction is a user-centric approach that pays artists from each individual listener. Under this scheme, a listener's subscription fees, or advertising revenue, goes only to the artists that person streamed. That's a more favorable approach for album-oriented and niche artists and less appealing for popular songs that get repeat listens. So far, only SoundCloud has adopted the user-centric model.

Artists' royalties also stand to benefit from efforts to clean up streaming services' catalogs. Spotify and Deezer have signed on to Universal Music Group's plan to reward professional musicians by demoting “functional” music and incentivizing distributors to crack down on fraud. Deezer has removed tens of millions of low-quality tracks, and anti-fraud measures may explain why the number of daily new tracks uploaded to streaming services fell about 4% in 2024, according to Luminate. But not all artists feel like they are benefiting from these changes. Spotify's move to limit royalty payments to tracks with at least 1,000 streams was widely seen as harmful to developing artists (as seen in this column on the streaming threshold from Ari Herstand ).

The Spotify paradox may never end, but artists can adjust to their new environment. In 2014, Swift's catalog was removed from Spotify by her record label, Big Machine Label Group. Earlier that year, Swift had penned an op-ed for The Wall Street Journal that argued “music should not be free” and urged artists to “realize their worth and ask for it.” Her entire catalog returned to Spotify and other streaming platforms in 2017. Did the economics of streaming change during Swift's three-year hiatus?不，不是真的。 Licensing deals may have extracted marginally better terms for artists and record labels, but streaming royalties are still a fraction of a cent per stream. One thing that changed was that more of Swift's fans became subscribers to Spotify, Apple Music (which launched in 2015) and other streaming platforms. Today, free streaming still exists, and a stream is still worth a fraction of a cent, but Swift is a case study in how to cultivate a vibrant streaming business while reviving the lost art of album sales.

; 1235889226 Drake Warms Up for Australian Tour Running Through His Hits at Karaoke: Watch https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/drake-australian-tour-karaoke-1235889143/Michael Saponara Fri, 31 Jan 2025 21:14:00 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-HopMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889143The Anita Max Wynn Tour kicks off in Perth on Feb. 4.

Drake is gearing up to take the stage in Australia for his Anita Max Wynn Tour kicking off next week. Before things get going, the 6 God took advantage of his trip down under by warming up his vocals with a karaoke session on Friday (Jan. 31).

Drizzy posted the clips to his Instagram featuring him on stage sitting atop a barstool in front of a closely gathered group of cheering women inside the intimate Melbourne venue.

Among the karaoke carousel found Drake performing Certified Lover Boy 's “Pipe Down,” Views ' “Faithful,” “Rich Baby Daddy” and deep cut “Trust Issues.”

The first show for the Anita Max Wynn Tour is set for Perth on Feb. 4, then Drake will head to Melbourne, Sydney, Brisbane and wrap up in New Zealand.

It appears Drake could be mixing up his setlist for the Aussie fans compared to his It's All A Blur Tour run from 2023.

There could also be a new project on the way as Drake and PartyNextDoor have continued to tease their $$$ joint project.

“Love to all the 6'ers,” Drake captioned a photo of the CN Tower on Jan. 26. “Winter months are the toughest. S–t can be depressing so take care of yourselves and try show love to each other. Be back in a flash. $$$OON.”

PND hinted that the project was near completion in November “Guys, I have one more show on this tour,” he told his followers. “Then the album is getting finished. That's all I gotta say.”

Watch some of the karaoke show clips below.

; 1235889143 Pedro Capó's 'La Carretera' Album & More: Which Is Your Favorite New Latin Music Release of the Week?投票！ https://www.billboard.com/music/latin/best-new-latin-music-release-poll-vote-pedro-capo-trueno-feid-1235889031/Jessica Roiz Fri, 31 Jan 2025 21:10:55 +0000 LatinMusicgenre latin https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889031 Check out this week's new Latin music releases and vote for the one you think is best.

This week, Billboard’s New Music Latin roundup and playlist — curated by Billboard Latin and Billboard Español editors — features fresh new music from artists including collaborations by Trueno and Feid, and Bomba Estéreo with Rawayana, as well as exciting albums from Christian Nodal, Pedro Capó, and Joaquina.

Nodal kicked off 2025 with the second EP from his “PA'L CORA” series. The six-track PA'L CORA EP.02 further solidifies his distinct mariacheño sound — a subgenre fusing mariachi's strings and horns with the norteño accordion — with other rhythms such as tropical (“Contigo al Cielo”) and dance (“Botox en el Cora”). Vulnerable yet protecting his heart, Nodal stamps personal experiences into themes of love, loss, and redemption in the lyrics.

Meanwhile, Capó's new album, La Carretera , is feel-good, reflective, and charged with life lessons. Sonically, the 14-track set is powered by pop-rock melodies, soft ballads, and even a country-tinged cumbia as heard in the Carín León-assisted “Existo”—born during “Making the Hit, Live!” panel at the 2023 Billboard Latin Music Week.

“This is the most honest and comfortable album I've ever created,” Capó said in a press statement. “Life is a journey, and like any road, it has its turns, ups, downs, good and bad times. The highway reminds us that it is not about the destination, but about the path we travel. Every experience, every step, defines us.”

Other new releases this week include Elena Rose and Morat's “Un Beso Menos,” Daddy Yankee's “En El Desierto,” and Jerry Rivera's “Volver a Enamorarnos,” to name a few. Who should win this week? Give these new releases a spin and vote for your favorite new Latin music release here .

; 1235889031 How Bad Bunny's 'Debí Tirar Más Fotos' Took the Charts By Storm https://www.billboard.com/pro/bad-bunny-debi-tirar-mas-fotos-how-dominated-music-charts/Dan Rys Fri, 31 Jan 2025 21:07:40 +0000 BusinessRecord LabelsExecutive of the WeekRimas Entertainment https://www.billboard.com/?post_type=billboard_pro_post&p=1235889177 "The key is ensuring that what we do resonates with him, with his personality as an artist and with his vision. Once we have that, everything is easier," says Rimas Entertainment's Monica Jiménez.

At this point in his career, Bad Bunny is way beyond breaking records. In 2020, he became the first artist to notch a No. 1 on the Billboard 200 with an all-Spanish album, and he's the only one to repeat the feat — not one, not two, but four times.

Now, Bad Bunny's latest album, Debí Tirar Más Fotos , has spent two weeks at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 — and it currently seems poised to notch a third consecutive week atop the tally. Of his four No. 1 albums on the all-genre chart, it's now the second longest running at the top spot; his 2022 set, Un Verano Sin Ti , collected the most weeks there with 13 non-consecutive weeks.

有关的

Can Bad Bunny and Rauw Alejandro Help Put Salsa Back in the Spotlight?

01/30/2025

This week, Debí Tirar Más Fotos is also No. 1 on Billboard ’s Top Latin Albums chart, and the song “DtMF” is No. 1 on the Billboard Global 200 chart for the second consecutive week . Bunny, in fact, occupies more than half the top 10 on the Global 200. On Billboard ’s Hot Latin Songs chart, nine of the top 10 songs are Bunny's, including “DtMF” at No. 1.

It's an astounding showing, even for an artist as big as Bad Bunny. It's also worth considering that Debí Tirar Más Fotos debuted at No. 2 on the Billboard 200 following an incomplete debut tracking week due to his decision to release the album on a Sunday — Jan. 5 — in anticipation of the Jan. 6 celebration of Three Kings Day, which is a big deal in Puerto Rico and ties with the album's love of Puerto Rico theme.

But Bunny quickly made up for lost time with a blitz of finely-tuned and very creative publicity efforts that ping-ponged from the US to Puerto Rico, including his stint co-hosting The Tonight Show alongside Jimmy Fallon , playing a surprise concert at a New York subway station, co-hosting a morning news show in Puerto Rico and surprising local podcaster Chente Ydrach with Puerto Rican parranda.

The final flourish was announcing a 21-date residency at Puerto Rico's Coliseo de Puerto Rico, with the first several dates available exclusively to Puerto Rican residents.

A major architect in Bunny's marketing and promotional strategy is Monica Jiménez , director of marketing and brand partnerships at Rimas' Bad Bunny Division.

Jiménez, who worked with brands like Coty and Procter & Gamble before joining Bunny's label and management company, works together with Rimas CEO Noah Assad on everything Bad Bunny and was pivotal in executing the artist's complex vision. The success of Debí Tirar Más Fotos earns her the title of Billboard 's Executive of the Week.

有关的

Breaking Down Bad Bunny's Billboard 200 Domination With 'YHLQMDLG' & More |…

01/24/2025

What exactly was your role in this album's roll-out?

One of my duties is understand and bring to life the vision of the artist for the album. Benito is an artist who fully immerses himself in the many facets of a release process, including marketing, and it's crucial to achieve what he visualizes for the project. I usually bring together the amazing ideas of the entire team and also look for new ideas to ensure a robust and strategic plan. I also focus on implementing the plan so it meets expectations, but above all, so it truly represents Benito's essence as an artist and conveys the message of the project.

So, what was this message? And what was the overlying strategy for the album?

The strategy was telling a story through nostalgia and taking a message of love and appreciation for our upbringing, regardless of where or what that upbringing was. With this album, we underscored our pride for Puerto Rico, and we wanted the whole world to feel this same pride. That's what we've presented in all our storyline and in everything we've done inside and outside the island. I think that's what's pushed such a special connection between the album and its listeners.

We're closing in on a third consecutive week at No. 1 on the Billboard 200, more than any other of Benito's albums except fo r Un Verano Sin Ti . What do you attribute that success to?

DEBí TiRAR MáS FOToS has been a very special project. I think the entire world has seen and understood the essence of what the album wanted to communicate: Benito's love for his culture and for his Latin people. I believe this has made the reception to the album different [from other albums].

This feels like more of a passion project than any of Benito's previous albums. Do you think that has had an impact on people's obsession with it?

确实。 Benito has always been very vocal about his commitment and love for Puerto Rico. But here, he's devoted an entire project to his island — not only conceptually but also musically, betting on root genres and on young, local talent like Los Sobrinos [the band on the album, made up of students from Puerto Rico's Escuela Libre de Música] and Los Pleneros de La Cresta. It's made people look at the project from another point of view and value it even more.

Benito did more promo for this album than any other.为什么？ And how did you convince him to do it?

I truly think his connection with the project made everything flow easier. He wanted to do it that way, to support the release in the way he did. The key is ensuring that what we do resonates with him, with his personality as an artist and with his vision. Once we have that, everything is easier.

有关的

How Did Bad Bunny Manage Such a Massive Second Week for His 'Debí Tirar Más…

01/22/2025

Can you give me examples of marketing strategies that you thought were particularly effective?

Our strategy to reveal the song names generated a lot of buzz. We collaborated with Google Maps and Spotify, and as part of the collaboration, coordinates for each song on the album's tracklist were revealed on Spotify, encouraging fans to dive into Google Maps for hidden clues. We not only looked for a different, interactive way to do this, but it led to many people discovering different places on our island.

Another major effort was the short film released prior to the album. The story it told [of an older man, played by filmmaker and actor Jacobo Morales, who reminisces of his life and love for Puerto Rico] was a great preamble to the album. It was an emotional, well-done piece [directed by Bad Bunny himself] that connected with many people in and out of Puerto Rico. Plus, those short previews of different tracks that were included in the video opened up an enormous conversation on social media on what people could expect from the album.

Does it surprise you that such a Latin album is the most consumed in the US?

More than a “Latin” album, it's about the [Puerto Rican] rhythms that make up the album. I'm definitely positively surprised, and as a Puerto Rican, it fills my heart. It's a huge step for music as a whole.

What's next with this album?

We never stop. There are many things coming up around the album. Plus the residency in Puerto Rico, which is something historic and will definitely be special for everyone who comes to visit and enjoy.

; 1235889177 10 Country Artists Who Have Brought Their Talents to Musical Productions https://www.billboard.com/lists/country-singers-broadway-musical-productions/Jessica Nicholson Fri, 31 Jan 2025 20:56:17 +0000 CountryMusicbroadway https://www.billboard.com/?post_type=pmc_list&p=1235887564 Billboard looks at country artists who have had top roles in musicals throughout the years.

Country music artists have long had ties to musical theatre — and it seems natural, given that both country music concerts and the electrifying shows of Broadway share similarities. Both are built around stories and tales that connect with human emotions, and both feature teams of people intent on combining music, songwriting, performance, lighting and production to convey a message and experience that fans take with them for years to come.

Country artists have brought their musical and performance gifts to musicals–whether on Broadway, off-Broadway, touring or on television–in several ways. Most recently, Dolly Parton revealed that she wrote the book and music for the upcoming project Dolly: An Original Musical , which will premiere in Nashville this summer at Belmont University 's Fisher Center for the Performing Arts, before heading to Broadway in 2026. Parton previously had crafted the music and lyrics for the musical version of the movie 9 to 5 , based on the 1983 film which starred Parton, Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin.

In 2022, singer-songwriter Brandy Clark worked with songwriter-producer Shane McAnally to craft the musical Shucked , which earned nine Tony nominations ( Shucked cast member Alex Newell won in the best featured actor in a musical category). “King of the Road” and “Dang Me” hitmaker Roger Miller wrote the music for the Tony Award-winning musical Big River . Meanwhile, Kenny Rogers co-created the holiday musical The Toy Shoppe (the musical also starred another country singer, “Only Here for a Little While” hitmaker Billy Dean).

More often, though, country singers including Reba McEntire, Jennifer Nettles, Larry Gatlin and Mac Davis parlayed their talent for entertaining audiences into key roles in an array of musicals throughout the years. Below, we look at several country artists who have had roles in musicals, whether on Broadway, in touring productions or on television.

; 1235887564 Which Grammys 2025 Performance Are You Most Excited to See?投票！ https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/grammys-2025-performers-poll-1235889217/Rania Aniftos Fri, 31 Jan 2025 20:50:09 +0000 AwardsMusicGrammysMusic NewspollPop https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235889217 Let us know which 2025 Grammy performer you're most excited to watch by voting in our poll.

Along with the awards handed out throughout the night, the Grammy Awards always deliver star-studded performances — and this year is no different.

The 2025 Grammy performers announced so far include Benson Boone, Billie Eilish, Charli XCX, Chappell Roan, Cynthia Erivo, Doechii, Stevie Wonder, Coldplay's Chris Martin, Lainey Wilson, Herbie Hancock, Brittany Howard, Brad Paisley, Teddy Swims, Janelle Monáe, John Legend, Sheryl Crow, St. Vincent, Jacob Collier, Raye, Sabrina Carpenter and Shakira.

Six of the performers — Boone, Roan, Doechii, Raye, Carpenter and Swims — are all nominated for best new artist. The other two nominees, Shaboozey and Khruangbin, have not been announced as performers.

Additionally, there will be a salute to the late Grammy legend Quincy Jones, who died in November at age 91, as well as tributes to the city of Los Angeles and the annual In Memoriam performance.

Let us know by voting here and below. The 2025 Grammy Awards, which will be hosted by Trevor Noah are set to return to Los Angeles' Crypto.com Arena on Sunday, Feb. 2. The show, which will help to raise funds for those who were affected by the Los Angeles wildfires, will broadcast live at 8 pm ET/5 pm PT on CBS and will be available to stream live and on demand via Paramount+.
